# 土味情话

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/tuwei-qinghua
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/tuwei-qinghua
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install tuwei-qinghua
tuwei-qinghua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g tuwei-qinghua
tuwei-qinghua <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
